name: ReverseRegionalRail
0:
”Alexa, reverse my train”
”Alexa, start reverse my train”
”Alexa, ask reverse my train for set departure station to gladstone”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: reverse my train
des:
This skill uses septa's real time API to figure out when your regional rail will arrive next.
This skill is a build on skill of the Regional Rail skill, it will flip the arrival and departure station.
In other words, it will get the time of the train from your arrival station to your departure station.
This skill uses a database that stores your departure and arrival station, this way, you will only need to set up the stations once and just ask alexa reverse my train and it will give you the info you need!

Valid Station names are:
9th Street Station, 9th St, 30th Street Station, 49th Street, Airport Terminal A, Airport Terminal B, Airport Terminals C and D, Airport Terminals E and F, Allegheny, Allen Lane, Ambler, Angora,
